hero.alt: Abstract swirling light trails representing creative spark

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP THEME: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors defined in 'colors' section. Use CSS variables for light/dark mode switching.
3. CREATE LAYOUT: Build the Landing Page using the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Do not use simple columns.
4. USE IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for the category cards. Do not use placeholders.
5. CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: When using Shadcn components (Input, Button, Card), override their default styles with the classes defined in 'components'.
6. ADD TEXTURE: Add a fixed position div with a noise texture to the root layout.
7. NO GENERIC AI: Do not use robot emojis or 'AI' generic blue gradients. Stick to the 'Creative Studio' aesthetic.
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
